conbody.p: Relations tab gives information on the relation between yours and other objects/texts. The default setting is a "partOf" relation to the parent element.
Choose between "Partof" and "is cross-reference to" relation:
Partof Your current entry is part (child) of another.
Is cross-reference to This references your entry to another entry.
Enter the Name of the related object here.
Search for the object in the corpora of your current project.
Click it to add more relations.
This removes a relation from the object.
